headline: How Johnson Controls' Asia Pacific Leadership Shift At Johnson Controls International (JCI) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Johnson Controls International has appointed Susan Hughes as vice president and president for its Asia Pacific region, reporting to CEO Joakim Weidemanis and joining the executive committee, succeeding Anu Rathninde, who will leave at the end of February 2026. Hughes brings decades of operational experience in Asia Pacific from her tenure at Emerson, combining sales, engineering and manufacturing expertise with fluency in Mandarin, which may be particularly relevant for deepening the...
